Description:
Your development environment is only a couple of clicks away, requiring no local installation. GitHub Copilot coding agent does more than just suggest code - it helps you triage issues, debug and run tests, and even acts as a peer developer, building code from issues you assign.

See how GitHub Copilot keeps developers focused on building! ⚡

#GitHubCopilot #CodingAgent #CopilotCodingAgent

▬▬▬▬▬▬ TIMESTAMPS ⌚ ▬▬▬▬▬▬

00:00 Setting Up Environments 00:32 Prioritizing Work 01:20 Generating Code 02:06 Agent Mode in Action 02:49 Fixing Tests and Dependencies 03:09 Using Instruction Files 03:45 Writing Commits and Pull Requests 04:33 Reviewing Copilot’s Work

About GitHub It’s where over 100 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
Author: GitHub
Title: Demo: end-to-end agentic development with GitHub Copilot
